game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to quest giver.
game.description: Rumor has it that the lost artifact is hidden deep in the forest. Brave the wilderness and bring it back to complete the quest.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.description: You must venture into the dark forest to begin your search for the artifact.
Beneath a large oak tree, you will find an entrance to a secret cave. Explore it.
In the depths of the cave, you will find the artifact. Take it and return to quest giver.
